article.title: Web Applications Working Group
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.abstract: This group of designers creates specifications to improve client-side applications development on the Web. The site hosts the group's work in several publicly available documents.
article.text: This group of designers creates specifications to improve client-side applications development on the Web. The Web Applications Working Group site hosts the group's work in several publicly available documents. Visitors can access core interface information such as media access and extensible information for metadata. Other files provide data on network and file transfer applications such as file uploads and progress events.
